trans-unit.source: Step 4: Receive Messages from the Queue
trans-unit.target: Step 4: Receive Messages from the Queue

trans-unit.source: This is the fourth step in the <token>sb2</token> messaging features tutorial.
trans-unit.target: This is the fourth step in the <token>sb2</token> messaging features tutorial.

trans-unit.source: In this step, you obtain the list of messages from the queue you created in the previous step.
trans-unit.target: In this step, you obtain the list of messages from the queue you created in the previous step.

trans-unit.source: To create a receiver and receive messages from the queue
trans-unit.target: To create a receiver and receive messages from the queue

trans-unit.source: In the <codeInline>Queue()</codeInline> method, iterate through the queue and receive the messages using the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">M:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.QueueClient.Receive</codeEntityReference> method, printing out each message to the console.
trans-unit.target: In the <codeInline>Queue()</codeInline> method, iterate through the queue and receive the messages using the <codeEntityReference qualifyHint="true">M:Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.QueueClient.Receive</codeEntityReference> method, printing out each message to the console.
